t_audio_discussion_question_3::clip_card: Record sound of how the event ends.
t_audio_discussion_question_3::title: Why is the event important?
t_audio_discussion_question_3::clip_card: Record sound of where the event happens.
Record sound of a place important to the event.
t_audio_discussion_question_3::text_card: Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template examines the importance of a single event. Discussions work well for introducing events with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
You may want to substitute the name of the event you are focused on where you see \“the event.\”
t_audio_discussion_question_3::clip_card: Record sound that introduces your discussion.
t_audio_discussion_question_3::evaluatio: Does your story tell us why the event is important?
